Mask each subject's REHO surface data

```{r}
mask_REHO_data <- function(subid, sesid){
  
  #load in the REHO gifti files and save as cifti
  reho.lh <- readgii(sprintf("/cbica/projects/spatiotemp_dev_plasticity/Inhibition/Alpraz/xcpabcd/task_regress/surface/xcp_abcd/%1$s/%2$s/func/%1$s_%2$s_task-emotionid_space-fsLR_den-32k_hemi-L_desc-reho_den-91k_bold.func.gii", subid, sesid))
  reho.rh <- readgii(sprintf("/cbica/projects/spatiotemp_dev_plasticity/Inhibition/Alpraz/xcpabcd/task_regress/surface/xcp_abcd/%1$s/%2$s/func/%1$s_%2$s_task-emotionid_space-fsLR_den-32k_hemi-R_desc-reho_den-91k_bold.func.gii", subid, sesid))
  xii <- as_xifti(cortexL = reho.lh$data$normal, cortexL_mwall = xii.mask$meta$cortex$medial_wall_mask$left, cortexR = reho.rh$data$normal, cortexR_mwall = xii.mask$meta$cortex$medial_wall_mask$right)
  
  #smooth REHO data
  xii <- smooth_xifti(x = xii, surf_FWHM = 6, cortical_zeroes_as_NA = TRUE)
  
  #mask it
  REHO.Lcortex.masked <- sweep(xii$data$cortex_left, MARGIN = 1, xii.mask$data$cortex_left, `*`)  
  REHO.Rcortex.masked <- sweep(xii$data$cortex_right, MARGIN = 1, xii.mask$data$cortex_right, `*`)  
  
  xii.REHO.masked <- as_xifti(cortexL = REHO.Lcortex.masked, cortexL_mwall = xii.mask$meta$cortex$medial_wall_mask$left, cortexR = REHO.Rcortex.masked, cortexR_mwall = xii.mask$meta$cortex$medial_wall_mask$right)
  
  #save it
  dir.create(path = sprintf("/cbica/projects/spatiotemp_dev_plasticity/Inhibition/Alpraz/reho/%1$s/%2$s/", subid, sesid), recursive = TRUE)
  write_xifti(xii.REHO.masked, file.path(sprintf("/cbica/projects/spatiotemp_dev_plasticity/Inhibition/Alpraz/reho/%1$s/%2$s/%1$s_%2$s_task-emotionid_space-fsLR_den-91k_desc-reho_smooth_masked_den-91k_bold.dscalar.nii", subid, sesid)))
  
  rm(xii)
  rm(xii.REHO.masked)
}
```

```{r}
for(row in c(1:nrow(participants))){
  subid=participants[row,1]
  sesid=participants[row,2]
  mask_REHO_data(subid, sesid)
}
```

Prepare REHO data for PCA

```{r}
REHO.matrix <- matrix(NA, ncol=59412, nrow=nrow(participants))

for(row in c(1:nrow(participants))){
  subid=participants[row,1]
  sesid=participants[row,2]
  cifti.path = sprintf("/cbica/projects/spatiotemp_dev_plasticity/Inhibition/Alpraz/reho/%1$s/%2$s/%1$s_%2$s_task-emotionid_space-fsLR_den-91k_desc-reho_smooth_masked_den-91k_bold.dscalar.nii", subid, sesid)
  xii <- read_xifti(cifti.path)
  
  lh.data <- t(xii$data$cortex_left[,1])
  rh.data <- t(xii$data$cortex_right[,1])
  cortex.data <- cbind(lh.data, rh.data)
  REHO.matrix[row,] <- cortex.data
  
  rm(lh.data)
  gc()
  rm(rh.data)
  gc()
  rm(cortex.data)
  gc()
  rm(xii)
  gc()
}

saveRDS(REHO.matrix, file = "/cbica/projects/spatiotemp_dev_plasticity/Inhibition/Alpraz/reho/pca/REHO.subxvertex.matrix.Rdata")
```

Run PCA on REHO inputs
```{r}
inputmatrix <- readRDS("/cbica/projects/spatiotemp_dev_plasticity/Inhibition/Alpraz/reho/pca/REHO.subxvertex.matrix.Rdata")
  
inputmatrix[inputmatrix == 0] <- NA #convert 0s to NAs
inputmatrix <- as.data.frame(inputmatrix) #convert matrix to df
inputmatrix.cleaned <- inputmatrix[, unlist(lapply(inputmatrix, function(x) !all(is.na(x))))] #remove all columns (vertices) with null data (all NAs)

#PCA
REHO.pca <- prcomp(inputmatrix.cleaned, scale. = TRUE, center = TRUE) 
saveRDS(REHO.pca, file = "/cbica/projects/spatiotemp_dev_plasticity/Inhibition/Alpraz/reho/pca/loadings/REHO.pca.loadings.Rdata")
```

```{r}
#How much variance do the first ten components explain?
print(summary(REHO.pca)$importance[2,1:10]*100)
  
#Scree plot #eblow room eblow room
pve <- 100*(REHO.pca$sdev)^2/sum ((REHO.pca$sdev)^2)

plot(pve, pch=16, 
     xlab="Principal Components",
     ylab="Prop. of variance explained")
```

```{r}

```

